scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production gulp build
scripts.bpcordova: npm run cordovainstall && npm run build && npm run preparecordova
scripts.bprelease: npm run bpcordova && cd ./cordova/app && cordova build --release
scripts.fullpackage: npm run cordovareinstall && npm run bprelease
scripts.wincordovainstall: SET NODE_ENV=production && cd cordova && gulp --gulpfile ./gulpfile.js cordova:app:install
scripts.wincordovareinstall: SET NODE_ENV=production && cd cordova && gulp --gulpfile ./gulpfile.js cordova:app:reinstall
scripts.winfullpackage: npm run wincordovareinstall && npm run winbprelease
scripts.winbuild: SET NODE_ENV=production && npm run clean && gulp build
scripts.winbpcordova: npm run wincordovainstall && npm run winbuild && npm run winpreparecordova
scripts.winbprelease: npm run winbpcordova && cd ./cordova/app && cordova build --release
